thread.title: Best 5.1 Speakers for PC Gaming

author: Cale Hunt
title: Best 5.1 Speakers for PC Gaming
text:
Updated February 22, 2017: We refreshed this list to ensure you're still getting the loudest, clearest 5.1 speakers for PC gaming available today.
Best overall Runner-up Best budget 
Best overall Logitech Z906 
See at Amazon 
If you want loud — and who doesn't when it comes to gaming? — you want the Logitech Z906. These things have 500 watts of power that will knock your socks off, and it has a detailed control console so that you have reign over all aspects of your sound. With wall-mountable satellite speakers and plenty of cord for large setups, you'll be tempted to buy a set these for every room in the house.
Bottom line: For the best overall 5.1 PC gaming speakers, go with the Logitech Z906.
One more thing: If you plan on setting this up in a theater situation, you can use the included remote control to change settings from the couch.
Why the Logitech Z906 is the best The Logitech Z906 speakers offer THX-certified audio that will really knock your socks off. You can connect up to six devices including two optical — ideal for anyone with home theater ambitions beyond PC gaming. A control console gives you complete reign over your sound, and you can sit back with a remote control in your hand.
